extendedInfo.description: Use Stock Quotes to monitor stocks, currencies and other financial instruments. Earn money by having the right information whenever you need it.- Monitor any financial instrument such as stocks, markets and currencies.- Shows data such as: price, ask, bid, high, low, P/E, EPS, volume and more.- Currency can be defined per asset.- Define price and quantity to get profit and market value automatically calculated.- Monitor your favorite market index.- Automatic updates gets quote data periodically (interval, days and hours can be customized). - Notifications/alerts in the status bar.- Notifications/alerts can be customized (vibration, sound and LED color).- Portfolio summary showing your overall profit and market value.- Arbitrary summary currency (assets with different currencies are automatically converted using online rates).- Graph of historical prices (3 years, 1 year, 6 months, 3 months, 1 month). - Download news- Transfer your portfolio between ROMs/devices using import/export feature.Help me improve the application! Send feature requests, bug report and idea using e-mail. I cannot help/respond to market comments.

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: Simple but it offers what I want.
reviews.author: tony d

reviews.title: A great app
reviews.comment: It rocks and does everything it should do. Any issues are fixed very quickly
reviews.author: Martin TRY

reviews.comment: Nice portfolio and stock manager app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t update
reviews.comment: I have the pro version on Samsung SII, it won\'t update the quotes automatically only manually. Hope it will be fixed soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: Its a great app. I love it but it doesnt work on ICS on my xoom tablet. every time I hit the menu button i get a FC. hopefully ICS support soon
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be nice except I can\'t get the Dow index to work, tried several symbol variations. No reply from developer.
reviews.author: A Google User
